title: Void Break (Part 3)
body:
Void Break (Part 3)

Evan hovered high in the sky while using the invisibility effect of Shadow Walk skill and looked at Grunk and two other orcs who had just left the cafe a few minutes ago.

"I didn't want to use the Soul Search skill on people for no reason just to get information about this place, but since this guy presented himself to me, it would be rude of me to ignore him," Evan muttered and used the second effect of growth link skill to take Illusia's skill Chameleon Illusion to change his appearance.

When Grunk asked Evan to come with him before leaving the café and Julius stopped him, Evan clearly felt Grunk's killing intent towards him.

Although Evan wasn't sure what was going on, he guessed that Grunk and the others already knew he was new in this place and had come to the café with ill intentions towards him.

'Once I use Soul Search skill on him everything will become clear' Evan thought inwardly and dived down from the sky.
